alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Dauphin; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 8:15PM EDT until June 03 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CUMBERLAND...SOUTH CENTRAL DAUPHIN AND NORTHWESTERN YORK COUNTIES... At 814 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shiremanstown, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Lower Allen, Mechanicsburg, Camp Hill, New Cumberland, Enola, Steelton, Lemoyne, Boiling Springs, Wormleysburg, Bressler-Enhaut-Oberlin and Dillsburg. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 230 to 244. Interstate 83 from mile markers 36 to 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
